message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
I'll do better than meet you in the middle. Let's try again!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still looking for a good deal!
I'll take the lead, but you'll still get a decent share!
I'd rather not give up that much. Let's try to find a better balance!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm still looking for a fair deal. Your turn!
I'll take the majority, but you'll still get something!
I'd rather not give up that much. Let's try to find a better balance!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll take most of it, you can have a small share!
I'll take the small share. It's better than nothing!
